com.paydiant.android.core.domain

Class DeviceSecurityProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.domain.DeviceSecurityProfile

  • public class DeviceSecurityProfile
extends Object
    The Class DeviceSecurityProfile. The domain object for device security profile.
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected AdditionalInformation additionalInformation 
      protected String authorizationCode

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeviceSecurityProfile()
      The constructor for convenience initializes the UserCredentials and DeviceFingerprint objects.
      DeviceSecurityProfile(ContextWrapper context)
      Instantiates the DeviceSecurityProfile with the android ContextWrapper object, which will be used to initialize some of the device specific parameters like app version, app signature, device ids etc.
